title: The John Deere X9 The Most INSANE Farming Machine #shorts #johndeere #agriculturalmachinery

tasks.task: Operate down the hill pulling a hydraulic disc plow.
subtasks: Insert the disc plow into the ground.
Maneuver the tractor and plow down the hill.
Adjust the hydraulic systems to control the depth and speed of the plow.

tasks.task: Lift the hydraulic disc plow.
subtasks: Release the hydraulic pressure on the plow.
Raise the plow using the lift mechanism.

tasks.task: Reocate the hydraulic disc plow back down the hill.
subtasks: Lower the plow to the ground.
Resume driving the tractor down the hill with the plow attached.

tasks.task: Back up the tractor and disc plow.
subtasks: Drive the tractor in reverse.
Position the disc plow in a specific location, likely for storage or to avoid obstacles.

tasks.task: Disconnect the hydraulic disc plow from the tractor.
subtasks: Turn off the hydraulic system associated with the plow.
Use a lever or button to release the disc plow from the tractor's implement pull.

tasks.task: Store the hydraulic disc plow on the trailer.
subtasks: Place the raised disc plow on the trailer for transport.
Secure the plow on the trailer to prevent movement during transit.

tasks.task: Conduct a visual inspection of the hydraulic disc plow.
subtasks: Check for any visible damages or wear on the plow's components.

tasks.task: Prepare the hydraulic disc plow for its next use.
subtasks: Clean the plow of any debris collected during use.
Lubricate necessary parts to ensure smooth operation next time.
Replace any worn or damaged parts as needed.

tasks.task: Approach the disc plow.
subtasks: Drive the tractor close to the disc plow to engage it.

tasks.task: Engage the hydraulic disc plow.
subtasks: Use hydraulic controls to lower the plow to the ground.
Engage the mechanical parts of the plow to prepare for discing.

tasks.task: Disc the area, cutting into the soil.
subtasks: Operate the disc plow across the field to turn over the soil.

tasks.task: Pilot the tractor down the hill with disc plow attached.
subtasks: Drive the tractor at a steady speed while the disc plow cuts the soil.

tasks.task: Use hydraulic blind tow discs.
subtasks: Position the tow discs correctly on the tractor.
Operate the hydraulic system to control the depth and speed of the tow discs.

tasks.task: Move hydraulic blind tow discs through a field.
subtasks: Guide the tractor over the field with the tow discs cutting the soil.

tasks.task: Patrol the Hill with disc plow.
subtasks: Drive the tractor with attached disc plow along the hillside.

tasks.task: Drive the disc plow across the field.
subtasks: Operate the tractor to cut the surface of the field with the disc plow.

tasks.task: Navigate down the hill, discing beside the existing furrows.
subtasks: Control the tractor's speed and the plow's depth to follow existing furrows.

tasks.task: Continue discing across the slope.
subtasks: Keep the plow in motion across the field, turning over the soil uniformly.

tasks.task: Approach a dip in the ground while discing.
subtasks: Adjust speed and plow angle to navigate the uneven terrain.

tasks.task: Navigate up an incline pulling the disc plow.
subtasks: Slow the tractor's speed while going uphill with the disc plow.

tasks.task: Control steering while discing steep hills.
subtasks: Use the tractor's steering to keep the plow aligned with the furrows.

tasks.task: Keep the disc plow blade edges clean.
subtasks: Ensure the disc plow is cutting properly without becoming clogged.

tasks.task: Ensure the disc plow is set to the correct depth.
subtasks: Adjust the hydraulic depth settings of the plow to achieve the desired soil turnover.

tasks.task: Address bad spots in the field.
subtasks: Identify problem areas in the soil and adjust discing to improve.

tasks.task: Monitor tractor's hydraulic system pressure.
subtasks: Keep an eye on the pressure gauge to ensure proper function.

tasks.task: Listen for unusual noises coming from the disc plow.
subtasks: Audibly check for any strange sounds that might indicate issues.

tasks.task: Check the hydraulic fluid level.
subtasks: Verify that the hydraulic fluid is at the proper level to prevent leeks.

tasks.task: Watch for any leaks in the hydraulic system.
subtasks: Scan the equipment for any signs of fluid leakage.

tasks.task: Check for vandalism or tampering.
subtasks: Inspect the disc plow and tractor for any signs of damage not from use.

tasks.task: Apply starter fertilizer to the field.
subtasks: Use a fertilizer spreader to distribute starter fertilizer.

tasks.task: Use a fertilizer spreader in rows.
subtasks: Position the fertilizer spreader to spread fertilizer between rows.

tasks.task: Control the application rate of fertilizer.
subtasks: Adjust the speed of the fertilizer spreader to match the tractor's speed.

tasks.task: Check the fertilizer spreader's calibration.
subtasks: Ensure the spread pattern is even and the correct amount is being applied.

tasks.task: Adjust deflector plates on the fertilizer spreader.
subtasks: Modify spreader plates to direct fertilizer where needed.

tasks.task: Pump hydraulic fluid.
subtasks: Operate the hydraulic pump to provide power for the disc plow.

tasks.task: Position the tractor and plow over the field.
subtasks: Align the tractor at the starting point of the discing operation.

tasks.task: Seek to medium discing.
subtasks: Determine the right depth to disc based on the field's needs.

tasks.task: Go to the discing area field.
subtasks: Drive to the specific field where discing is required.

tasks.task: Rotate the land.
subtasks: Turn the soil to improve aeration and add organic matter.

tasks.task: Cut a layer into the ground.
subtasks: Use the disc plow to slice through the soil to the desired depth.

tasks.task: Till a field.
subtasks: Prepare the soil by breaking up clumps and mixing in fertilizer or manure.

tasks.task: Address manure delivery issues.
subtasks: Ensure that manure is properly spread and incorporated into the soil.

tasks.task: Partner with another discer.
subtasks: Coordinate efforts with a second discer to cover more ground.

tasks.task: Pointing the disc plow to the hill
subtasks: Adjust the angle or direction of the disc plow to face uphill or down.

tasks.task: Distribute fertilizer along the field.
subtasks: Move the fertilizer spreader to apply fertilizer along the length of the field.

tasks.task: Set the disc plow's depth to 10cm.
subtasks: Adjust the hydraulic settings to achieve a 10cm disc depth.

tasks.task: Prop the disc plow and raise the rear of the tractor.
subtasks: Use hydraulic props or blocks to raise the plow for transport.

tasks.task: Piste the hill.
subtasks: Ensure the equipment can navigate the terrain safely.

tasks.task: Adjust the depth of the disc plow.
subtasks: Fine-tune the depth settings for optimal soil discing.

tasks.task: Remove the disc plow for the day.
subtasks: Disconnect the plow and store it in the garage or shed.

tasks.task: Use the fertilizer spreader to amend the soil.
subtasks: Apply necessary amendments like lime or gypsum across the field.

tasks.task: Use the disc plow to cut down weeds.
subtasks: Disc the field to eliminate weeds by cutting them off at the roots.

tasks.task: Check the field for crops or cover crops.
subtasks: Look for existing vegetation that needs to be prepared or managed.

tasks.task: Check the disc plow for attachment.
subtasks: Verify that the disc plow is securely attached to the tractor.

tasks.task: Control the depth of the disc plow.
subtasks: Adjust the hydraulic depth control to set the desired depth.

tasks.task: Raise the hillock.
subtasks: Lift the tractor or disc plow to manage inclines.

tasks.task: Adjust the depth of discs.
subtasks: Modify the depth settings of the disc plow during operation if needed.

tasks.task: Remove a disc.
subtasks: Detach a specific disc from the disc plow for repair or adjustment.

tasks.task: Test the disc plow at 10 cm depth.
subtasks: Conduct an initial pass to check the depth setting before full-scale operation.

tasks.task: Mow with the disc plow.
Disc for weeds.
subtasks: Disc the field to manage weeds by cutting them down.

tasks.task: Remove the rear wheels from the vehicle.
subtasks: Take off the tractor's rear wheels for transporting the machine.

tasks.task: Continuously monitor the depth of the disc plow.
subtasks: Regularly check the plow's depth to maintain consistency.

tasks.task: Drive back on the hill.
subtasks: Return up the hill with the tractor and disc plow.

tasks.task: Retrieve the disc plow.
subtasks: Bring the disc plow from storage to the field.

tasks.task: Rotate the fields.
subtasks: 交替耕作不同的地块以保持土壤健康。

tasks.task: Walk through the field after discing.
subtasks: Inspect the field for any missed areas or problems.

tasks.task: Apply the disc plow to soften the soil.
subtasks: Use the plow to break up compacted soil layers.

tasks.task: Apply multiple to disc off in the field.
subtasks: Consecutive passes with the disc plow to achieve desired soil conditions.

tasks.task: Adjustet the disc plow depth.
subtasks: Modify the depth setting by a few centimeters as needed.

subtasks: Collaborate with a virtual reality bot or video streamer during operations.

tasks.task: Disc with the tractor and hydraulic discs.
subtasks: 操作联合收割机配合液压圆盘耙进行土壤处理。

tasks.task: 侍弄果树发芽情况。
subtasks: 确保果园中的树木发芽情况良好。

subtasks: 修理或更换损坏的圆盘。

subtasks: 对草莓田进行圆盘耙作业以改善土壤结构。

subtasks: 调整拖拉机的挡位以适应不同的作业需求。

subtasks: 前后两次不同的圆盘耙作业以达到更均匀的土壤处理。

subtasks: 调整圆盘耙的张力以确保工作时的稳定性。

subtasks: 重新定位圆盘耙以备运输。
